Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Establishes the veterans service organizations fund
Summary: Establishes the congressional chartered veterans service organizations fund and provides for gifts made to such fund on an individual's personal income tax return.
LawCode: Add ยง630-g, Tax L; add ยง99-hh, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to gifts for the support of congressional chartered veterans service organizations
